commandDescription:
displays metadata coverage information for metadata files in a SFDX project
Displays metadata coverage information for the metadata files in the current project.

Detects metadata files in all package directories of the current project. Use --source to print metadata coverage information for a subset of metadata files in specific folders only.

Use one of the --check... flags to display coverage information for the specified deployment method.

Use --showuncovered to display only metadata files that are not covered by the selected deployment method(s).
sourceFlagDescription: path of the source directory to scan for metadata files
showUncoveredFlagDescription: show only metadata files that are uncovered by (any of) the selected deployment methods
checkUnlockedPackagingWithoutNamespaceFl: Check for Unlocked Packaging (without Namespace) coverage
checkUnlockedPackagingWithNamespaceFlagD: Check for Unlocked Packaging (with Namespace) coverage
statusSearchingMetadataMessage: Searching for metadata files in project
statusReadingMetadataTypeMessage: Reading metadata type from metadata files
statusFindingMetadataCoverageMessage: Finding metadata coverage information for metadata files
logMessageNoMetadataFiles: No metadata files in any package directory
logMessageNoMetadataFilesInPackageDirect: No metadata files in package directory %s
